name: CSC on GitHub.
tagline: Unlock the value. Move Forward and Innovate faster.
body:
CSC is a global powerhouse in next-generation IT services and solutions.  Our people and transformative offerings help businesses and communities across industry solve their toughest challenges.

[Hanlon](https://github.com/csc/Hanlon): Next-generation automation software for bare-metal and virtual server provisioning.

[Hanlon-Microkernel](https://github.com/csc/Hanlon-Microkernel): A small (in-memory) Microkernel used by the Hanlon server for discovery of new nodes.

[Cloud](http://www.csc.com/cloud)

[Careers](http://www.csc.com/careers)

[Big Fast Data](http://www.csc.com/business_drivers/offerings/82042-big_data_storage_solutions)

[Dan Hushon's Blog](http://www.vdatacloud.com/blogs/)

[Technology Office @ CSC](http://www.csc.com/innovation)

[Ingenious Minds](http://www.csc.com/ingenious_minds)


Connect with @tjmcs or @dhushon to learn more.

![CSC Logo](images/CSC_logo_small.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
